DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate efficacy tolerability Beclomethasone Dipropionate/Formoterol single inhaler twice daily regimen patient mild moderate persistent asthma . Patients randomise receive either Beclomethasone Dipropionate/ formoterol single inhaler ( total daily dose : BDP/FF 400/24 µg ) Beclomethasone CFC ( total daily dose : BDP 1000 µg ) 12 week treatment .
